metadata.title: CVE-2015-3863 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple integer overflows in the Blob class in keystore/keystore.cpp inKeystore in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48M allow attackers to executearbitrary code and read arbitrary Keystore keys via an application thatuses a crafted blob in an insert operation, aka internal bug 22802399.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
